bwwExcerpt: Also off-putting is that the musical’s rightly expressed message — that people with autism should not be objects of pity or a means to someone else’s inspiration — is undone by a book (Rebekah Greer Melocik) and score (Melocik and Jacob Yandura) that can only manage two things with the subtlety of semi-truck: tears and uplift. Complexity, take a hike.

keyPhrases.quote: off-putting is that the musical's rightly expressed message...is undone by a book and score that can only manage two things with the subtlety of semi-truck
tears and uplift. Complexity, take a hike

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic harshly criticizes the book and score as heavy-handed and lacking subtlety, undermining even the musical's well-intentioned message.
